com.gwtplatform.mvp.client
Interface View

All Known Subinterfaces:
PopupView, TabView
All Known Implementing Classes:
PopupViewImpl, PopupViewWithUiHandlers, RootPresenter.RootView, ViewImpl, ViewWithUiHandlers
public interface View

The interface for view classes that handles all the UI-related code for a Presenter.

Author:
Philippe Beaudoin, Christian Goudreau

Method Summary
 void addToSlot(Object slot, Widget content)
          Requests the view to add content within a specific slot.
 Widget asWidget()
          Retrieves this view as a Widget so that it can be inserted within the DOM.
 void removeFromSlot(Object slot, Widget content)
          Requests the view to remove content from a specific slot.
 void setInSlot(Object slot, Widget content)
          Requests the view to set content within a specific slot, clearing anything that was already contained there.
 

Method Detail

addToSlot

void addToSlot(Object slot,
               Widget content)
Requests the view to add content within a specific slot.

Override the default implementation and manage all the slots of your view into which content can be added. You should also consider overriding removeFromSlot(Object, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget). If the view doesn't know about this slot, it can silently ignore the request.

Used by PresenterWidget.addToSlot(Object, PresenterWidget).

Parameters:
slot - An opaque object indicating the slot to add into.
content - The content to add, a Widget.

asWidget

Widget asWidget()
Retrieves this view as a Widget so that it can be inserted within the DOM.

Returns:
This view as a DOM object.

removeFromSlot

void removeFromSlot(Object slot,
                    Widget content)
Requests the view to remove content from a specific slot.

Override the default implementation and manage all the slots of your view into which content can be added and removed. You should also override addToSlot(Object, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget). If the view doesn't know about this slot, it can silently ignore the request.

Used by PresenterWidget.removeFromSlot(Object, PresenterWidget).

Parameters:
slot - An opaque object indicating the slot to remove from.
content - The content to remove, a Widget.

setInSlot

void setInSlot(Object slot,
               Widget content)
Requests the view to set content within a specific slot, clearing anything that was already contained there.

Override the default implementation and manage all the slots of your view into which content can be placed. If the view doesn't know about this slot, it can silently ignore the request. When null is passed, your implementation should clear the slot.

Used by PresenterWidget.setInSlot(Object, PresenterWidget) and PresenterWidget.clearSlot(Object).

Parameters:
slot - An opaque object indicating the slot to add into.
content - The content to add, a Widget. Pass null to clear the slot entirely.
